text: An Jun Can (; 20 September 1983 - 1 June 2015), better known as Shone An, was a Taiwanese singer and actor. From 2002 until 2005, he was a member of the mandopop boy band Comic Boyz. He also appeared in many movie, television and theatre productions such as Case Sensitive (2011), Rhapsody of Marriage (2012) and Turn Around (2014). He was also a guest host on 100% Entertainment. He was born in Tainan. Shone An died from liver cancer on 1 June 2015 in Tainan, aged 31. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Taiwanese movie actors Category:Pop singers Category:Stage actors Category:Taiwanese actors Category:Taiwanese singers Category:Taiwanese television actors
title: Shone An
